column5: Hi all. My wife, daughter, and I will be staying at a little hotel on McCarthy lake in Stratford next weekend. I was wondering if anyone knows anything about the lake, and whether it will be worth me bringing some gear for us to fish from shore with... Thanks in advance!
https://www.hookandbullet.com/fishing-mccarthy-lake-newbury-on/https://www.hookandbullet.com/fishing-mccarthy-lake-newbury-on/   Hope this helps.  I just searched quickly
That's all I've found too. I was hoping there might be a few on here who might have fished it a few times. Worst case, I bring some soft plastics and hope for the best. Thanks!
Hey Adam, good luck exploring.  I wouldn't go by anything you find on Hook and Bullet, though.  I dunno where those reports come from but the species are usually waaaaaaaaay off.
"McCarthy lake in Stratford﻿ "? Stratford Ontario? I use to live in Stratford (and now live about 1/2 hr away) and never have heard of it. What place are you staying?
It's more of a pond..maybe 300m in length. It's just east of town off Forest Road. My guess is Forest Motel for the win! lol
grimsbylander that was also my guees. Not a serious fishing place. Years back it did get a few trout stocked but no idea how recent. My guess is a few panfish.
best people to ask are the owners of the motel.
Yup, Forest Motel is right. Just a couple of little bluegill were biting, and I'm not sure if there are any bass in there. It's just about choked with vegetation.
